segments.text: Smells good ! What ’ s for breakfast ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , since we are getting up so late , I decided to make a big breakfast !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Kind of , so I made scrambled and soft boiled eggs , some french toast and buttermilk pancakes !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow ! You really went all out ! Did you make any coffee ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , just the way you like it ! I also put out some cereal and muesli if you feel like having something more light .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Looks good ! I ’ ll squeeze us some fresh orange juice .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Get the jam and butter while you are in there ! Oh ! And don ’ t forget the syrup !
segments.speaker: S2
